text: Boulos Nassif Borkhoche (born Paul Victor Borkhoche, SMSP (7 October 1932 - 4 February 2021) was a Lebanese-born Syrian Melkite Greek Catholic hierarch. He was Archbishop of the Melkite Greek Catholic Archeparchy of Bosra and Hauran in Syria from 1983 to 2011. He became a priest in 1960. Borkhoche died on 4 February 2021 at the age of 88.Archbishop Boulos Nassif Borkhoche, S.M.S.P. â€  ==References== ==Other websites== * catholic-hierarchy.org Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lebanese Christians Category:Syrian Christian bishops Category:Archbishops
title: Boulos Nassif Borkhoche
